name: div
features: Delivery : FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
5-Star Fabric : 4.0 oz micro poly interlock built for durability, comfort, & all-season performance
Moisture Wicking : Pulls sweat away from the skin for cool, dry comfort during workouts
Rash Guard : Smooth, irritation-free fabric protects skin during intense activity
Stain Release : Engineered to resist stains & odors for long-lasting freshness
Fade & Snag Resistance : Maintains a clean, professional look wear after wear
UV Protection : 44+ UPF blocks harmful rays for outdoor performance & safety
Opacity & Printability : Ultra-tight knit construction enhances coverage & allows detailed decoration
Reinforced Seams : Shoulder seams built to handle heavy use & movement
Double Needle Stitching : Clean, durable hem finish that stands up to repeated wear
Tag-Free Comfort : No tag neckline prevents irritation for a distraction-free fit
